alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Menominee; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Marathon, southwestern Menominee and western Shawano Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Wittenberg, or 12 miles south of Antigo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Neopit around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Aniwa, Shepley, Lyndhurst, Gresham, Mattoon, Middle Village, Bowler, Zoar, Birnamwood and Lake Noseum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
